definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧绿凝重，深不见底，终年涌流不息。

sentences.english: The thirsty wayfarer was glad to find a fresh spring near the road.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的徒步旅行者很高兴在路边找到新鲜的泉水。

sentences.english: The water was spilling out of the mouth of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 泉眼中不断地涌出泉水。
泉水咕嘟咕嘟地往外冒。

sentences.english: The land cracked and the springs dried up and the cattle listlessly nibbled dry twings.
sentences.chinese: 土地龟裂，泉水干枯，牛儿无精打采地啃着干树枝。

sentences.english: Soft spring water washes her greasily smooth skin.
The earthquake stopped up many natural springs.
sentences.chinese: 地震堵塞了许多天然泉水。

sentences.english: You've got to hand it to the bottled water industry.
sentences.chinese: 你一定是把钱拱手交给矿泉水业。

sentences.english: Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
sentences.chinese: 即真主的众仆所饮的一道泉水，他们将使它大量涌出。

sentences.english: Day or night, Izumi Water Gel Plus gives your skin complete protection.
sentences.chinese: 泉水凝胶不管白天或晚上都能给予肌肤完整的保护。

sentences.english: The fountain babbled its familiar music.
sentences.chinese: 泉水发出惯常的潺潺声。

sentences.english: Chlorinate ornamental fountain or populate fountain with larvivorous fish.
sentences.chinese: 使用氯化泉水方法或者饲养以幼虫为食物的鱼。

sentences.english: Like drinking up a whole bottle of contaminated mineral water.
sentences.chinese: 例如把整瓶不洁的矿泉水喝光。

sentences.english: Small batch vodka alembic distilled from local grain and the spring water.
sentences.chinese: 这种限量伏特加采用当地的谷物和泉水酿造。

sentences.english: I like drinking spring water, as it is cool and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝泉水，因为它很清甜。

sentences.english: One day, I spend 4 hours to carry the fountain from the Yang Tai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我花了4个小时从阳台山背回了山泉水。

definition: mouth of a spring or fountain
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
water so clear you can see the bottom
